description: Try our easy to follow Barramundi in Red Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Red curry,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Barramundi,Fish,BBQ,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Barramundi in Red Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place fish fillets in a container. Spread curry paste over both sides of the fillets. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, place sweet chilli sauce, lime leaves, ginger, garlic and lime juice in a jug and whisk together to combine. Set aside.

Preheat BBQ grill to moderate. Brush fish with peanut oil. Cook on grill for 34 minutes each side, depending on thickness, or until just cooked. Transfer to plates, drizzle with dressing and garnish with coriander.
